name: code-anchor
description: opne for favorite files and bookmarks

code-anchor.icons.default.description: Path to custom icon for Default bookmarks (leave empty to use default icon). You can use absolute path or relative path from workspace root.

code-anchor.icons.todo.description: Path to custom icon for TODO bookmarks (leave empty to use default icon). You can use absolute path or relative path from workspace root.

code-anchor.icons.bug.description: Path to custom icon for Bug bookmarks (leave empty to use default icon). You can use absolute path or relative path from workspace root.

code-anchor.icons.note.description: Path to custom icon for Note bookmarks (leave empty to use default icon). You can use absolute path or relative path from workspace root.

code-anchor.icons.important.description: Path to custom icon for Important bookmarks (leave empty to use default icon). You can use absolute path or relative path from workspace root.

code-anchor.icons.question.description: Path to custom icon for Question bookmarks (leave empty to use default icon). You can use absolute path or relative path from workspace root.

code-anchor.icons.all.description: Path to custom icon for All Icons filter (leave empty to use default icon). You can use absolute path or relative path from workspace root.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run copy-resources
scripts.copy-resources: cp -r src/webview/template.html out/webview/ && cp -r src/webview/styles.css out/webview/ && cp -r src/webview/scripts out/webview/
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
